content: When Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw is defeated, you'll gain another Tadpole to upgrade your frog Spirit, as well as the Left Hand of Buddha! This means you can now use both hands to craft and purchase a special Immortal Blessing Gourd when you visit the Shen Monkey in the Zodiac Village!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw', specifically from the subsection 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw is defeated, you'll gain another Tadpole to upgrade your frog Spirit, as well as the Left Hand of Buddha! This means you can now use both hands to craft and purchase a special Immortal Blessing Gourd when you visit the Shen Monkey in the Zodiac Village!
